root: ^A secret rendezvous after the school building has been closed for the day? I’m always down for a little scandal.
^A boring scandal, who cares if multiple students enter after closing.
^What could we even do here that makes this exciting.

c-0: ^Who says I don’t want that to happen?
c-1: ^The school officials would definitely care. They’d bite the bullet hearing the news.
c-3: ^I could think of some things you and I could get to doing to make it exciting...
g-0: ^With all these unlocked classrooms too, I’m sure we can figure out some way to enjoy this evening.
^Seriously, who knew the professors and their laziness to lock the classrooms would come in handy?
